title: DPS BestOf
itunes:title: DPS BestOf
description:
On Today's Dan Patrick Show, DP talks to Ryan Clark about the Deandre Hopkins suspension. How does someone of his stature get popped for PEDs? Reggie Miller calls in to recap the NBA Playoffs up until this point. What was the Mavs strategy for Luka last night? And guys discuss their plans for the Sports Emmys night. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
